templates.name: Left Message 1

templates.sms_body:
Hi {leadName},


Edge Talent has tried to contact you regarding your recent model application. We will try calling you again over the next few days. If you would prefer, you can contact us directly on 07441 908220 at your convenience.

We hope to speak with you soon.

Kind regards,

Edge Talent Team

templates.name: Request for a Clear Photo
templates.subject: Request for a Clear Photo
templates.email_body:
Hi [lead name],

Thank you for submitting your photo for your recent model application.

To ensure your application moves forward, we require a clear, high-quality photograph that accurately represents you. It looks like the image you provided is not quite clear enough. 

Please email the new, high-quality photo back to us at your earliest convenience. This will prevent delays in processing your application.

Thanks for your understanding and quick action!

Best regards,
Edge Talent Team

templates.name: Attempted Call – Please Confirm Your Contact Number
templates.subject: Attempted Call – Please Confirm Your Contact Number
templates.email_body:
Hi [lead name],

This is Edge Talent, we hope you’re doing well. We attempted to call you earlier today and were unsuccessful. It seems we may have an incorrect number on file. Could you please confirm the best number to contact you on?

If you would prefer, you can contact us directly on 07441 908222 at your convenience.

Thank you, we look forward to speaking with you.

Best regards,

Edge Talent Team

templates.name: Booking Confirmation
templates.subject: Booking Confirmation
templates.email_body:
Hi {leadName},

Thank you for booking your Model Consultation and Test Photoshoot with Edge Talent. We’re excited to meet you and begin your journey with us.
Your appointment details are as follows:

Date:{bookingDate}
Time:{bookingTime}

Location: N1 Studios, 129A Weedington Rd, London NW5 4NX
All essential information — including detailed directions to the studio, outfit guidance and our full terms & conditions — can be found in your Welcome Pack. Please make sure to read it carefully before your appointment to ensure you’re fully prepared. 
You can also view the video here which covers your day with us: https://edgetalent.co.uk/model-consultation/

 - Please arrive 15 minutes prior to your scheduled appointment time.
 - Please make sure you have this email saved on your phone
 - If you need to reschedule or have any questions about your appointment, please reply to this email: diary@edgetalent.co.uk or call 07441 908 220.
 - For assistance finding the studio or if you’re running late, please call the studio on: 07858 186572
 
We look forward to seeing you soon!

Best regards,

Edge Talent Team
